resources.string: Updated information about COVID19 in Argentina

Welcome to COVID19 Status mobile. Here you can consult the actual status of Covid19 in Argentina. You could also consult International Information and share all that stuff with your friends and much more...
In Covid-19 Status we want to share with you information about your location so you can take the necessary precautions.
On the lateral menu you have all actions you can do with this app. Here we will explain each of them to you.

In Current Information, you can consult the info about a province This option has two modes: 1- If you has activated the geolocation, the app will show you a shortcut to your province 2- If you dont have geolocation activated, anyway you can choose a province from the list.
In Instructions section we explain you the app functionalities. We would like to thank you for trust in us and we hope to help you.
In this section, you will navigate a subsection were you could consult international information about Covid19
A lot of boring info about us. Let us take some credit !
We are two Computer Science students of Universidad Nacional Arturo Jauretche, we choosed to use our capabilities to bring you valuable information on a simple way.
Release fastly a service of trusted information. We do it without any revenue so be kindly and say thank giving us some feedback on Play Store.
We are two students from Florencio Varela, Bs. As., Argentina
Periodic notifications with COVID19 data according to your actual location
Share Covid-19 with your friends with the following link:
Now in \%s there are \%d new confirmed cases and \%d new deaths for a total of \%d confirmed cases and \%d deaths\
